meta.description: Thai Airways Royal Silk Lounge (Domestic) at Suvarnabhumi Airport (BKK), Concourse A. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

lounge.name: Thai Airways Royal Silk Lounge (Domestic)

location.description: Bang Phli, Samut Prakan, Bangkok, Thailand

lounge.description: Royal Silk Lounges at Suvarnabhumi Airport incorporate the Thai Airways concept - service with flair, elegance, and gentleness. Enjoy a haven of luxurious amenities, including premium snacks, refreshments, and Wi-Fi.

reviews.content: Old and run-down, but does is job. Very good Internet with ~40Mbps/2.2Mbps.
Lots of space. No shower. No alcohol. Lots of food options but low quality. I prefer the Bangkok Airways lounge.

It is a disappointment lounge, no alcohol beverages, loud (none lounge staffs) keeps bringing carts, loud conversations, and intrusion the experience.  

You are better off going the food court.
Good lounge for domestic flights - especially the hidden “garden area” at the end of the lounge, not much traffic and good to relax there.
Phòng chờ rộng, thoáng. Nhân viên phục vụ chu đáo, thức ăn và đồ uống tương đối nhiều, chất lượng ổn.
This lounge is solid for domestic.  Lots of hot food options and drinks. Definitely worth a visit.
Food selection needs improvement.
Pretty basic but it's the only choice in domestic apart from Bangkok Air's lounge. Tired. Initially looks okay but is not really. In need of new ideas and investment. A bit like  Thailand itself.
Food selection is poor. No alcohol. Hotter than rest of terminal because a/c is not good. Spent about 15 minutes and left.
Spacious and superb service. Could use more outlets.
Basic lounge. Food options are decent. The congee in the morning was tasty.
Get printed boarding pass, the invite doesn't show on your digital one. You'll also need it to receive wifi login.  Busy at noon, waited 10 min., plenty of seating. Nice food, no alcohol.
A solid domestic lounge at breakfast time - good food options, ans very nice design. The only drawback is that we weren't able to find a flight display.
It's nothing special. It is a domestic lounge and pretty surprising that there are no alcoholic beverages. But decent variety of food and non alcoholic beverages. Chicken satay was best thing.
No alcohol in this domestic lounge. Drink selection very poor. Food not the best either. Small, hot and crowded. Bad experience, do not recommend.
Definitely head to the garden area.
A lounge with a very small variety of food. Very clean and modern bathroom, comfortable seating. Nothing exceptional.
This is the lounge for TG domestic flights. The food and drink selection was not that great but not bad either. Was there for an 8am flight and it was pretty crowded. Very close to the gates.
Apart from a little cockroach we found at the coffee machine, everything else was great.
Main part was so-so, also smelled a bit funny (like someone poured vinegar all over the places) but the 'garden side' is nice, not much of a garden but more relaxing. See pics.
This is an okay lounge except that it's always very crowded at nighttime.
Because the A/C is inadequate, this often-crowded lounge is usually hot. The choice of food and drinks ranges from poor to merely okay.
